verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Thursday] [V: marked] [ARG1: the one year anniversary of Special Counsel Robert Mueller 's investigation into the Russian election interference with a tweet " congratulating America " for " the greatest Witch Hunt in American History] . "

President Trump on Thursday marked the one year anniversary of Special Counsel Robert Mueller 's investigation into the Russian election interference with [ARG0: a tweet] " [V: congratulating] [ARG1: America] " [ARG2: for " the greatest Witch Hunt in American History] . "
